TopicTitle: Woomerang site showing up when not wanted

Articles.Content:
I'm seeing the Woomerang Launch Site even tho "Allow other Launchsites" is off. Also getting a comm net signal from there even tho "Enable Extra Groundstations" is off.

I might try removing my mods and see if it's still happens. Don't have anything that touches comms tho I think. Just wondering if anyone else noticed it. A quick google search turned up nothing.

Career game, KSP version 1.1.4.2 with Making History dlc

Edited April 7, 2018 by Tolbin
